interface.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Channel.Interface.Transfer

method.name: Transfer

arg.name: member
arg.tp:docstring: The handle of the member to transfer

arg.name: destination
arg.tp:docstring: The handle of the destination contact

method.tp:docstring: Request that the given channel member instead connects to a different contact ID.

interface.tp:docstring: An interface for channels where you may request that one of the members connects to somewhere else instead.
